replies.author: calohmn

timeline.message:
[#1718] Add exception handling; improve link creation logic.

Fix onLinkEstablishmentTimeout(), not calling link.free()
there anymore (has caused session to get into invalid state).
Exceptions now get caught in disconnect/detach/close handlers
used in HonoConnectionImpl. A disconnect during link creation
now causes the creation attempt to be failed directly,
without waiting for the link establishment timeout.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>
